requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 6th Gen or better
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any computer with at least 2gb ram and a modern processor should run this just fine.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 1000 series or higher or Intel 7th Gen or Better
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 480 (4gb) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For best performance 4gb of ram and a Radeon 480 or better
